nodes.text: The Azure Sunset was a luxury sail barge owned by the Pantoran Kyja Cho. During the Galactic Civil War, Cho hosted a cruise aboard the Sunset, inviting prominent Hutt crime lords and Corporate Sector Authority executives to view a rare krayt dragon pearl she had in her art collection. Unbeknownst to Cho, an Inquisitor from the Empire had infiltrated the cruise and was posing as an executive.
